title: Problem with getting stuck in tutorial mode
body: I was playing a battle training game, and everything was going well until i was slain. i respawned at the summoner platform, but  was unable to access the shops, use the camera to scroll and observe the battle, or move around. this was not good because not only was i unable to learn how to play the game, but i got a warning that being afk would get me punished, even when it was not my fault at all. Please help me with thus issue because i dont want to be banned because of something i could not help.

replies.body:
The notification you received is just an introduction to how [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)works.  As DTN mentioned, you're safe to play the tutorial and leave whenever.  We ask that players stay committed to any matchmade games, or games where other real players are participating.  

Regarding the issue you had in-game, it sounds like your network is having a connection problem that is unable to relay information from the game server.  This in turn can cause your game to delay or become unresponsive.  As a first step, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to work on getting this resolved.  I hope that helps!
The tutorials seem to have many un fixed bugs ^_^ you wont be punished for afk , just re do the tutorial.
You can't be punished for afk'ing in a non-matchmade game, so you don't have to worry about that in the tutorial. I'm unsure how to fix the issue, though.
